pages.text: This section describes the process of enchanting leather using the brewing cauldron. After $(l:components/enchanted_leather)drying$(), it will find numerous uses, as even wizards need reliable leather boots, and witches desire fashionable pointed hats.

pages.title: Infusion
pages.text: With the aid of the cauldron, ordinary leather must be infused with magic in both a literal and figurative sense.
